description: This is a 'Global View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for prometheus and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. Originaed from GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.description: Numbers of containers of cluster that restarts in the last 60 minutes
panels.title: Containers Restarts (60 Min)

title: [TKS] Kubernetes / View / Cluster Global
